headline: Illinois Tool Works (ITW): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: Since May 2025, Illinois Tool Works has been in a holding pattern, posting a small loss of 2.2% while floating around $241.23. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 11.5% gain during that period.
